scripts.deploy: bun run build && mkdir -p deploy && cp -r dist/* deploy/ && cp package.json deploy/ && cd deploy && npm install --production && zip -r ../function.zip . && cd .. && rm -rf deploy && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name calfire-gis-mcp-server --zip-file fileb://function.zip
scripts.version:patch: bun run build && git add dist && git commit -m 'build: update dist' && npm version patch
scripts.version:minor: bun run build && git add dist && git commit -m 'build: update dist' && npm version minor
scripts.version:major: bun run build && git add dist && git commit -m 'build: update dist' && npm version major
